Assistant2026-01-09T00:26:50.414Z


📝 Write CLAUDE.md


/home/mudprod/CLAUDE.md


# Achaea Notes - Character: Lecun (Grook Psion)

## Key Learnings

### Combat
- `WEAVE CHARGE <target>` - Main attack (2.3s balance)
- `CURING ON` - Enables auto-healing
- Auto-curing regenerates health during combat

### Gold & Corpses
- **Imp Lord** (Ember Tower throne room) buys pixie corpses
  - Path: WALKTO IMPS, then go in, south, east, north, up, east, up, east, south
  - Gives gold per corpse + bonus XP for every 10 corpses (2000-3000 XP)
  - Corpses decay quickly - sell fast!

### Useful Commands
- `WALKTO <landmark>` - Auto-walk to named locations
- `LANDMARKS` - List available landmarks
- `CONFIG COMMANDSEPARATOR |` - Use | to chain commands

### Quest Progress
- Complete tasks for Beku after reaching level 10
- Tutorial tasks ongoing (skip player interaction ones)
- Goal: Level 21

### Locations
- Pixie Village - Good XP, pixie corpses sellable
- Ember Tower - Imps, corpse buyer (Imp Lord)
- Miba Village - Pygmies, cook wants kobold meat





Tool reply2026-01-09T00:26:50.660Z
File created successfully at: /home/mudprod/CLAUDE.md

Tool reply2026-01-09T00:27:00.486Z
A pixie heaves his bucket in from the east.
700h, 565m, 2000e, 2120w ex-��Clearing in Pixie village.
Many of the stars are disguised behind looming clouds, tracing their slow paths across the sphere of the heavens. The small, circular clearing is surrounded on all sides with small pixie huts. The ground is packed, light-brown dirt. A square garden in the centre is full of colourful blossoms. It is a lovingly tended garden. Each of the huts has small gardens in front as well as short gardens on either side of the paths leading to them. Most have colourful window boxes filled with all varieties of flowers, even the most exotic. Frilly lace curtains softly rustle in the windows of the pixie huts. None of the roofs are slated, except for the hut of the Pixie Queen, but they are all well built with straw and moss. Some of the huts even have bright green lawns growing from their roofs. The village is loved and well cared for. A common red admiral butterfly flits about over your head. Struggling with a full bucket, a pixie plucks morning dew from leaves.
You see exits leading east, southeast, and south.
700h, 565m, 2000e, 2120w ex-��

Tool reply2026-01-09T00:29:11.592Z
Under the weeping willow tree.
Many of the stars are disguised behind looming clouds, tracing their slow paths across the sphere of the heavens. A huge weeping willow tree with long soft tendrils that slowly sway in the light breeze towers above the beautiful surroundings. The lawn around the pretty tree has been mowed to just a few inches long. It is soft and bouncy, just the ideal place to take a long restful nap. In fact, someone has forgotten their rumpled chequered blanket next to the base of the trunk. It would be perfect for anyone happening to be passing by. The willow tree looks almost as old as the village's other famous tree, the gigantic oak whose spreading branches can be seen from this vantage point. It is very hard to resist the temptation to have a short nap under the peaceful tree. This is a soothing and happy place. A common red admiral butterfly flits about over your head.
You see exits leading north, northeast, west, and northwest.

750h, 565m, 2200e, 2335w ex-��Clearing in Pixie village.
Many of the stars are disguised behind looming clouds, tracing their slow paths across the sphere of the heavens. The small, circular clearing is surrounded on all sides with small pixie huts. The ground is packed, light-brown dirt. A square garden in the centre is full of colourful blossoms. It is a lovingly tended garden. Each of the huts has small gardens in front as well as short gardens on either side of the paths leading to them. Most have colourful window boxes filled with all varieties of flowers, even the most exotic. Frilly lace curtains softly rustle in the windows of the pixie huts. None of the roofs are slated, except for the hut of the Pixie Queen, but they are all well built with straw and moss. Some of the huts even have bright green lawns growing from their roofs. The village is loved and well cared for.
You see exits leading east, southeast, and south.

Tool reply2026-01-09T00:36:57.288Z
Dusty hut. (indoors)
Oaken beams slam into the earth and provide the main structure of this small hut. Composed of mud, sand, and woven twigs, a heavy barricade of wattle and daub offers protection from the elements outside. Layers of straw roof the den, fastened by lengths of rope, infusing the cramped space with a musty aroma. Shamanic charms dangle from amidst the dried stalks, the space overhead cluttered by a plethora of odd talismans, gruesome shrunken heads, and the half-rotten remains of several rodents. The corpse of a freshly slain adventurer lies here before you, his chest ripped open to expose a void where his heart should be. A pygmy wearing an elaborate feathered headdress stands here. A heavy iron chest has been pushed against the back wall.
You see a single exit leading out.

Daduchos Ryssa Embersong, Epopt of Goldentide is riding on a fiery chestnut pegasus. Her face is partially concealed beneath the raised hood of hooded aestival robes. She wields a beautifully carved ironwood shield in her left hand.

At the eastern end of the main hall, a long slab of polished wood spans nearly from the northern wall to the south, barstools scattered along its outer edge. Closer examination reveals that the bar top appears to be all of one piece, cut masterfully from the trunk of some giant tree. Despite the varnish upon the wood, several dark stains remain. The shelves behind the bar block the view of the kitchens behind them, if not the clattering of pots and pans. Dozens of bottles of liquor crowd together upon the shelves, with the bottles of most elegant appearance taking a place of pride upon the top. A pile of wooden barrels, presumably filled with ale and wine, are stacked in a corner behind the bar.
